com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Annotation Type AppPublics.UseNativeBroadcast


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Inherited
public static @interface AppPublics.UseNativeBroadcast
    When applied to the AppPublics.BroadcastListener.getIntentFilter() method, the implementation used will be the native Context.sendBroadcast(Intent) method will be used, instead of the LocalBroadcastManager.sendBroadcast(Intent).

    The LocalBroadcastManager is better regarding the performance, and safer in terms of security, because it restricts the broadcast consumption to the application.

    Since:
    2013.04.22
    See Also:
    AppPublics.BroadcastListener
